text: The 4th CC.NN. Division "3 Gennaio" (Italian: 4Âª Divisione CC.NN. "3 Gennaio") was a Italian blackshirt militia division created on June 25th, 1935 for the Second Italo-Ethiopian War against Ethiopia. The name "3 Gennaio" "3 January" was chosen to celebrate the date that Benito Mussolini took absolute power over Italy. Category:1930s establishments in Italy Category:Military of Italy
title: 4th CC.NN. Division "3 Gennaio"
